content: materials 9 skeins of purl soho s worsted twist 1 100% merino wool each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams - color a 2 skeins approximately 328 yards required - color b 3 skeins approximately 492 yards required - color c 3 skeins approximately 492 yards required - color d 1 skein approximately 164 yards required you ll also need… - us 8 5 mm 32-inch circular needles 2 note for an updated version of this project with a different gauge rectangular shape and two sizes visit our color study blanket in daily wool 3 gauge 18 stitches and 36 row = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions 39 inches wide x 39 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/worsted-twist html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/2025/03/24/color-study-blanket-in-daily-wool/
